target_sites.name: mlbprediction
target_sites.angle: Analytics, advanced stats (xBA, WAR, xFIP), data-driven

target_sites.name: bestmlbhandicapper
target_sites.angle: Sharp money, expert handicapping, situational angles

news_items.headline: ESPN Fantasy: Everything you need to know about player position eligibility rules
news_items.description: Which players qualify at which positions for 2026 and beyond? Tristan H. Cockcroft explains the rules.

news_items.headline: MLB 2026: Inside Driveline's hitting lab
news_items.description: We got an all-access pass to a two-day MLB training session in Scottsdale, Arizona.

news_items.headline: Getz, Venable say White Sox enter '26 season with 'momentum'
news_items.description: White Sox GM Chris Getz and manager Will Venable believe they have a group poised to build on the progress it showed last season, when the team improved by 19 wins over the 2024 season.

news_items.headline: Austin Gomber signs minor league contract with Rangers
news_items.description: Veteran left-hander Austin Gomber has signed a minor league contract with the Texas Rangers that includes an invitation to major league spring training.

news_items.headline: Mets sign Craig Kimbrel, Austin Barnes to minor league deals
news_items.description: The New York Mets signed reliever Craig Kimbrel to a minor league contract Thursday with an invitation to big league spring training, giving the nine-time All-Star an opportunity to pitch for his 10th different team should he make the club.

news_items.headline: Fantasy baseball news or noise: 30/30 for Evan Carter? Is Bryce Miller a heavy sleeper?
news_items.description: Eric Karabell keeps tabs on the baseball world and tells you what is relevant to fantasy baseball managers.
